people.name: Tyler de Rijk
people.description: During my second year of Software Engineering, I struggled to find part-time roles in my field. Most opportunities required 32 hours or more. I was fortunate to secure a position, but I realized many others might not be as lucky. This inspired me to create Rijkware.

people.name: Vlad Milosteanu
people.description: As the Public Relations Officer at Rijkware, I play an important role persuading businesses about the potential of Student Developers.

team.name: Samy Farahat
team.description: Works on the Tandartspraktijk Rembrandt Project as a Student Developer.

team.name: Rehan Choudrey
team.description: Works on the Tandartspraktijk Rembrandt Project as a Digital Marketeer.

team.name: Tonko Klein Gunnewiek
